title: Marzia Kjellberg rests up after gruesome injury on PewDiePie holiday
text:
Marzia and Felix enjoyed a romantic trip away (Picture: PewDiePie/Instagram)

Marzia Kjellberg has been getting some much-needed rest after suffering a gruesome injury during her Japanese getaway with her husband PewDiePie.

She definitely deserves a lie down after all the drama.

The internet star, who tied the knot with Felix back in August, shared an adorable snap of the pair’s pug Maya on Instagram.

Donning a cheetah costume, Nala looked cute as anything as she nestled in bed.

Meanwhile, Felix was overjoyed to be home with the pup as well, as he shared a video with her, writing: ‘Waking up next to my real wifey.’

Let’s hope Marzia isn’t too offended.

Despite the pair having an amazing holiday in Japan, with Marzia sharing a whole host of gorgeous photos to social media, it wasn’t all smooth sailing after she suffered a gruesome injury.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The 26-year-old shared a snap of a pesky knife, writing: ‘I was opening the packaging for this knife and it slid out and landed tip first vertically onto my bare toe. Not fun. Lots of blood.’

Giving her fans some sound advice, she added: ‘Just a reminder to be careful while handling knives.’

With fans clearly worried about her, Marzia went on to say: ‘Thank you all for worrying about the toe. It is a very dark purple colour near the cut, so it’s not looking pretty BUT I’ve been able to walk all day so I assume it’s not that serious. I’m hoping it will heal on its own.’

Marzia issued a warning to fans (Picture: itsmarziapie)

She later updated fans, assuring them that there’s ‘no need to worry’.

Sharing a cute cartoon drawing of what her toe might look like IRL, the 26-year-old doodled her digit with a big smile on its face.

‘I see lots of questions about my toe so here it is today,’ she wrote, with a winking emoji. ‘It’s definitely getting better and I’m totally fine so no need to worry.’

Although Felix has still been uploading videos every day, the pair have been enjoying a well-earned break in Japan (which is where they got engaged back in 2018) following their wedding in London’s Kew Gardens earlier this year.

description: Marzia Kjellberg rests up with dog Maya after gruesome injury on holiday in Japan with husband PewDiePie (Felix).
